snippet: Though Hurricane Sandy raged up the East Coast, New Jersey may have taken the brunt of it. Here is a dispatch from one of the teachers with whom we collaborate weekly for this feature describing what life is like for her and her students this week.
abstract: Though Hurricane Sandy raged up the East Coast, New Jersey may have taken the brunt of it. Here is a dispatch from one of the teachers with whom we collaborate weekly for this feature describing what life is like for her and her students this week.

headline.main: Common Core Practice Interrupted as Our New Jersey Classroom Collaborators Recover
